user_bio:
I design and build production-ready automation workflows with n8n, focusing on API integrations, LLM orchestration, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
My work combines practical automation, clean architecture, and real-world AI use cases—always aiming for workflows that are robust, maintainable, and easy to extend.

I’m especially interested in document pipelines, vector databases, and turning complex systems into simple, reliable automations.
